channel.title: Souljah boi xD
channel.description:
Haiii, I like rap to hell with you if you flame me so sdfu.
Souljah Boy: Crank dat (super man dat hoe) - - - http://youtube.com/watch?v=kFac7eQ8R58 - - -
Any1 else liek it? XD

item.title: Souljah boi xD
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:3, topic:136022”]Fuck that.
I hate that.

I listen to loads of rap (or crunk music like this).

Spell his fucking name right for one.

I used to LOVEE him, all last summer and school year.
Nobody knew what I was talking about.
Then he made this song.
And I was like HELL YEAH the first day it came out.

And showed everyone the dance.

Fast forward like a month or so, and EVERYONE knows this song.
He remade it and it sounds like shit.
Everyone fucking cranks this shit all the time.
Honestly, it’s turned to crap.[/quote]

Read … No flaming. I hate rap but I’m not flaming.

Thilly ThNoobs

Read full topic

item.title: Souljah boi xD
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Hell naw.
You gotta listen to stuff like Crank Squad, PLP, T.I., and some of that mainstream shit is okay. Like TPain, Lil Jon, they’re pretty listenable.

item.title: Souljah boi xD
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:7, topic:136022”][quote author=Original Daniel link=topic=187506.msg1703595#msg1703595 date=1188126897]
That is terrible, listen to rappers who can actually rap. Immortal Technique for example.
[/quote]

You just listen to that cos PaulT does you freak. His raps are more like a long monotone story… good when you listen to it a few times then its just like… I just wasted 7 minutes listening to a story on tape.[/quote]

Actually I didn’t even know PaulT listened to Immortal Technique, and dance with the devil isn’t his only song you know, his style is different to that.

Good examples of Immortal Technique’s style would be Bin Laden and The point of no return.

Read full topic

item.title: Souljah boi xD

item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Fuck that.
I hate that.

I listen to loads of rap (or crunk music like this).

Spell his fucking name right for one.

I used to LOVEE him, all last summer and school year.
Nobody knew what I was talking about.
Then he made this song.
And I was like HELL YEAH the first day it came out.

And showed everyone the dance.

Fast forward like a month or so, and EVERYONE knows this song.
He remade it and it sounds like shit.
Everyone fucking cranks this shit all the time.
